item.title: Automate Sun iLOM settings
item.description: I recently had a need to push out a few settings to a group of iLOMs on new Sun servers. I really despise using a web interface for everything so I took the ssh route. The first thing I tried to do after determining the commands I needed was to shove the commands in with ssh directly. I quickly became apparent that route just wasn’t going to work. When you log into the iLOM “daemons” need to initialize.
